page.title: 01POPULATION AGE & JOBS
page.content: {AGE 0_10 07 (2 Pre School, 5 Primary) 10_20 15 (6 Secondary,5 Colleges) 20_30 14 (1 College, 13 Lismore) 30_40 11 40_70 58 70_85 20 85+ 00 {EMPLOYMENT Most farms are worked single handed with mutual help for clipping and dipping. There are few jobs for school leavers. The new granite quarry in Morven, employing 500, gives jobs to a Lismore shot-firer, driller and three seamen, one in charge of all their present boats. One girl has made her own job by opening a cafe at the main pier. There are three fishermen, and people earn some money picking whelks.
